name: The Mystic Key (IAPSOP)
content:
The Mystic Key (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: The Mystic Key Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Mystic Key, The. A Monthly Magazine of Personal Power, Spiritual and Psychic Unfoldment. Other titles: Super-Psychology 1928—1930 Monthly Rochester, NY. Publisher: Erwood Publishing Co.. Editor: Will J. (William Joseph) Erwood; Florence Russell, associate editor; Francis J. Flanagan. Succeeds: Radiant-->The Radiant Life-->Super-Psychology 1/1, September 1928-August 1930. 34 pp., $1.50 a year.M The journal offered "Health Culture, Mental Science, Occultism, Mediumship, Oriental Mysticism and the Teachings of the Masters." Erwood (1874-1948) was an essayist, poet and spiritualist who earlier had edited The Radiant Life and went on to Super-Psychology. Yale University; University of Illinois; Skidmore Library, Lily Dale. Issues:Mystic Key V3 N6 Feb 1930
